meaningMnemonic: The <radical>cow</radical> of <radical>righteousness</radical> is always there for us. He is the cow that must <kanji>sacrifice</kanji> himself for us to survive.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>sacrifice</kanji> must be done via <reading>gui</reading>llotine (ぎ). I know, I know, that sounds really brutal, but it's the best way. It's fast, it's effective, and hopefully the sacrifice—I mean, cow—doesn't feel a thing.
